p.k: Chuck Norris is back in this action-packed martial arts showcase co-starring the legendary Lee Van Cleef. Plagued by memories of his brother's murder, Scott James (Norris) is recruited by a wealthy heiress who seeks revenge against an international terrorist training camp known as The Octagon. Realizing his adopted brother is the one training the terrorists, Scott faces off against him. Only they know the electrifying killing techniques and secrets many try to learn in The Octagon.
